ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Archers and Quivers
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing that I noticed: if you have the very same type of arrows in your ammo slot and in your quiver, the arrows in the ammo slot will be used until it only
ygData.messageBody:
One thing that I noticed: if you have the very same type of arrows in
your ammo slot and in your quiver, the arrows in the ammo slot will be
used until it only contains one arrow, then the arrows will be pulled
from the quiver. If you have a different type of arrow in your quiver
than is in your ammo slot, the last arrow will be pulled from the ammo
slot (leaving it empty) and no arrows will be pulled from the quiver.

Hope this helps.

--- Techpriest <techpriest@...> wrote:
> Hi! new to the list. I play on the Tunare server. I have a 13
> Iksar Monk
> but have been playing my 5 Wood Elf Ranger lately.
>
> My ranger has a quiver that he keeps his arrows in. I saw a tip when
> I
> logged on that says keeping arrows in a quiver decreases attack time.
> I can
> not get him to draw from his quiver. The only arrows he uses are in
> the
> ammo slot. The quiver will not fit in the ammo slot. If I have no
> arrows
> in the ammo slot I get a message "Out Of Ammunition" when I try and
> use my
> bow, even with my quiver full. I have tried putting the quiver on my
> back
> and it won't fit there either. I have asked a bunch of people in
> game with
> no luck, searched the web and looked in my hint book.
>
> While on the subject of archers, my bow and arrows each have a range
> and
> damage rating. My bow is Range 75 Damage 8 (I think). My arrows are
> Range
> 25 Damage 1. What is my range and damage? 100 and 9 by adding the
> numbers,
> 25 and 1 taking the lower of each? Something else?
>
> Thanks in advance!
>
>
>
